subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
I have sent you email twice but no response from you, Are you alive
or have you changed your email address?
We received a message from Zenith Bank, that one MR RUBEN
FRANCISCO GARCIA from HONDURAS forward his Below Account information
to Zenith Bank that you have authorized him to transfer your Fund
USD$10.5 Million into his account as your next-of-kin.
Below is the account information MR RUBEN FRANCISCO GARCIA forwarded
to Zenith Bank.
BANK NAME: WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A.
BANK ADDRESS: P.O.BOX 6995 PORTLAND, OR 97228 USA.
ACCOUNT NUMBER: 7107810690.
ACCOUNT NAME: MR RUBEN FRANCISCO GARCIA.
SWIFT: WFBIUS6S.
ROUTING: 121000248.
HOME ADDRESS:COLONIA ORQUIDEA BLANCA, 18 AVE.,9 CALLE, N.O., # 903.SAN
PEDRO SULA, HONDURAS.
As a matter of urgency, please reply immediately as the Zenith Bank
and the Federal Government wants to know if you are the one that authorized
MR RUBEN RANCISCO GARCIA to claim your Fund USD$10.5
Million.
Looking forward to your urgent reply.
Regards.
Ambassador Mary Beth Leonard
The U.S. Ambassador to the Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Reply to this Email:  
marybethleonardu@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Ambassador Mary Beth Leonard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm alive and well, thank you for asking. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall authorizing anyone named Mr. Ruben Francisco Garcia from Honduras to transfer any funds on my behalf.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did Zenith Bank receive this message? And how did my name get involved in this?

I appreciate your help in clearing up this confusion.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Sir,
We confirmed receipt of your email, your urgent response is highly
appreciated.
I am convinced that you are not the one who authorization the Honduras man
to come and claim your fund.
To proceed with this payment in your name, you are expected to forward your
personal details which includes, your full name, current address,  WhatsApp
number and a copy of your identity card.
Regards.
Mrs Mary Beth Leonard.
US Ambassador

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Beth Leonard,

Thank you for your email. I'm a bit confused about the situation with the Honduras man, could you please explain that further? 

Also, I would like to know more about this fund you mentioned. How did it come to be in my name and what is its purpose?

I appreciate your help in understanding this matter better.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott
